image:image.image:title: A highway overpass with a clear blue sky in the background. A green road sign attached to the overpass displays an airplane symbol with the text "Narita" and "E51". Two tall lampposts extend from the overpass, casting minimal shadow. The image captures a section of the overpass structure in shadow on the right.

A small speedboat moves swiftly across deep blue ocean waters, leaving a trail of white wake behind it. The boat, positioned slightly off-center to the right, is angled diagonally toward the top of the image. The water around the boat is textured with small waves and ripples.
Curved highway over water with multiple lanes, elevated train running on upper level, cars on lower levels, surrounded by urban buildings and water reflections.

A man and a child stand on a sunlit beach by a calm body of water. The child, wearing a pink dress, reaches towards the man, who is dressed in a black shirt and tan pants. A small black dog sits nearby, while bags and items lie on the sand. The background features a stone wall lining the water.

Aerial view of a waterfront with a concrete walkway bordered by a metal railing. Sparkling sunlight reflects on the water's surface. Several people are positioned along the walkway, some engaged in fishing. A bicycle is parked near the grassy area with neatly arranged steps and a lamppost, casting elongated shadows onto the ground.

Steel framework with a grid-like pattern dominates the foreground, casting shadows and lines across the image. A blurred background reveals modern building structures with sunlight illuminating parts of the metal and concrete surfaces. The contrast between light and shadow adds depth to the scene.
Beam of light cutting through darkness from a row of aligned spotlights, angled downwards, creating sharp contrast in a dark setting. Series of circular holes visible in the background.
Silhouetted city skyline during sunset, featuring tall buildings with visible signs. The sky transitions from deep orange to purple hues. Geometric structure frames the upper corners of the image.

A small boat with a dark hull and an illuminated interior floats on a dark, textured water surface. The boat has several people on board and features a rounded front and an open area on top. Soft warm lighting highlights the boatâ€™s details, contrasting with the surrounding deep blue water.
